interest1.title: APIs
interest1.description: lately i've been interested in the Sheetsu API to use Google Sheets as a backend.  i think i'm going to dive into the Star Wars API soon.

interest6.title: logic pro
interest6.description: i've used logic pro to record and edit music for over 10 years.

interest7.title: rowing
interest7.description: i enjoy rowing, but only on an erg... i'm just not a confident enough swimmer to really row.

interest8.title: nutrition
interest8.description: i got my minor in college in nutrition and food science.  my intense love of junk food needed this sort of counterbalance.

interest9.title: cooking
interest9.description: at the moment i'm working my way through a ninja turtles pizza book and a bob's burger's burger book.

interest10.title: weightlifting
interest10.description: i'm primarily a 5/3/1 kinda guy, but i do like to pepper in some olympic lifting and crossfit odds and ends.

interest11.title: video games
interest11.description: fallout/skyrim style is the top for me, next is turn-based tactical, then after that i can throw down on some first person shooters or puzzle kinda games.

interest12.title: longboarding
interest12.description: i learned to longboard at 29, so all i do is carve and cruise.

interest13.title: dogs
interest13.description: i've got a granny-dog bichon and a sweet golden-doodle.  curly dogs for life.

interest14.title: junk food
interest14.description: pizzas, burgers, hot dogs, donuts... i love them and have tattoos of all of them.

interest15.title: star wars
interest15.description: if you want a conversation starter with me, this is the place to begin!

interest16.title: harry potter
interest16.description: i'm a gryffindor with a deathmark tattoo... i'm really working to put some respeck on our name after peter pettigrew.  nuff' said.

interest17.title: lord of the rings
interest17.description: i do a lord of the rings extended edition movie marathon every year, to include all 7 hobbit meals.  i can make a mean potato leek soup.

interest18.title: marvel universe
interest18.description: i just need a good Silver Surfer origin movie and i'll be a happy man.

interest19.title: board games
interest19.description: i absolutely love co-op board games.  i'm always down for a good board game night.

interest20.title: hiking
interest20.description: i go on a few backcountry hiking trips every summer.  i've even done part of the Appalachian trail.
